name: DON'T LET PLANT BE DEAD, SO ROBO CAN'T BE SAD
name_original: DON'T LET PLANT BE DEAD, SO ROBO CAN'T BE SAD
description:
DON'T LET PLANT BE DEAD, SO ROBO CAN'T BE SAD

Made for Ludum Dare 46.

CONTROLS

"A" and "D" to move.

If you like games that have controls, consider SPACE TO INVESTIGATE. A game made the weekend before this one.
